_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Northstar

description:

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/{system32,winsxs,globalization,}
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/{drivers,wbem,spool,Speech}
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/spool/drivers/x64/
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/Speech/common/
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/globalization/sorting

##Setting up Tf2 folder
for x in \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/"Program Files"/"Common Files"/System/*/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/drivers/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/wbem/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/spool/drivers/x64/*/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/Speech/common/* \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/winsxs/*/* \
; do \
    orig="/usr/lib/wine/x86_64-windows/$(basename "$x")"; \
    if cmp -s "$orig" "$x"; then ln -sf "$orig" "$x"; fi; \
done && \
for x in \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/globalization/sorting/*.nls \
    /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32/*.nls \
; do \
    orig="/usr/share/wine/nls/$(basename "$x")"; \
    if cmp -s "$orig" "$x"; then ln -sf "$orig" "$x"; fi; \
    done
